news.title: End-to-End Encrypted Email Providers Also See Sign-Ups Surge as Chat App Users Flock to Signal and Telegram in Search of Privacy
news.description: After Facebook announced changes to the terms and conditions of its popular chat app, users searching for greater data privacy protections are turning to alternative apps and encrypted email providers.

news.title: Signal and Telegram Are Also Growing in China – for Now
news.description: Despite the Chinese government’s propensity for digital censorship policies, certain chat apps presently remain available in China, either through the App Store or through more creative means.

news.title: The Tech That Was Fixed in 2020 and the Tech That Still Needs Fixing
news.description: The tech world experienced many highs and lows in 2020, including advances in video chat, fitness tech, and electric scooters but problems with delivery apps and foldable phones.

news.title: YouTube Launches Hashtag Landing Pages to All Users
news.description: “Hashtag landing pages,” which are dedicated spaces featuring only videos using a particular hashtag, may change how users and creators leverage hashtags on YouTube.
